subject: Olympic Games
lead_paragraph: The city of Vancouver, British Columbia, will borrow more than $360 million to ensure that the $800 million athletes’ village will be built for the 2010 Winter Olympics. British Columbia politicians voted unanimously to support legislation that allows Vancouver to borrow the money without going to a public referendum.
